timeline.bodyText: Could you revert this file (since there are no real modifications) ?
timeline.author: minhtutonthat

replies.bodyText: Yes, ok. Is seems to be reverted, but in this review it is compared with my previous version. But is reverted to the original one.
replies.author: georgiana-ecobici

timeline.bodyText: First, could you use helpers here? Second, why do we return empty for title block annotation here?
timeline.author: minhtutonthat

replies.bodyText: If I use the helper (TitleBlockHelper), I introduce a cyclic dependency. I return empty String because otherwise in Properties view it displays "(DAnnotaion) Diagram Title Block" in the title.
replies.author: georgiana-ecobici

replies.bodyText: I undo changes in this file, moved it to Title Block providers but will show the meta class Title Block.
replies.author: georgiana-ecobici

timeline.author: minhtutonthat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@
+/*******************************************************************************
+ * Copyright (c) 2020 THALES GLOBAL SERVICES.
+ * All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+ * are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+ * which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+ * http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+ *  
+ * Contributors:
+ *    Thales - initial API and implementation
+ *******************************************************************************/
+package org.polarsys.capella.core.diagram.helpers.providers;
+
+import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter;
+import org.eclipse.sirius.viewpoint.description.provider.DescriptionItemProviderAdapterFactory;
+
+/**
+ * This is the factory that is used to provide the interfaces needed to support Viewers. The adapters generated by this
+ * factory convert EMF adapter notifications into calls to {@link #fireNotifyChanged fireNotifyChanged}. The adapters
+ * also support Eclipse property sheets. Note that most of the adapters are shared among multiple instances. <!--
+ * begin-user-doc --> <!-- end-user-doc -->
+ *
+ * @generated
+ */
+public class TestItemProviderAdapterFactory extends DescriptionItemProviderAdapterFactory {

timeline.bodyText: Revert this file if no modification.
timeline.author: minhtutonthat

replies.bodyText: OK. I reverted to the original vers, diff will appear because on titleBlocks branch already contains some changes on this file.
replies.author: georgiana-ecobici

timeline.bodyText: This should be the uri of the package containing DAnnotation class
timeline.author: minhtutonthat

timeline.bodyText: This should be the only check.
timeline.author: minhtutonthat

replies.bodyText: I don't understand, keep only TitleBlockHelper.isTitleBlockAnnotation or target instanceof DAnnotation.
replies.author: georgiana-ecobici

timeline.bodyText: There's no need to extend DescriptionItemProviderAdapterFactory. You could just pass it directly to the decorator.
timeline.author: minhtutonthat

replies.bodyText: Is because I kept the original provider for DAnnotation (added this provider only if the DAnnotation is for aTitle Block).
replies.author: georgiana-ecobici
